name: The Tribulations of Decisions
description:
Title:

    The Tribulations of Decisions

Platform:

    Print to Play

Genre:

    Narrative Game

Rating:

    E

Target Market:

    Ages 12+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

    This game takes you through a typical day of a teenager in the fresh beginnings of high school. You will be forced to make typical decisions that may or may not have consequences.

Instructions:

    Download the HTML and follow the prompts.

Game Design Team:

    Zack Mattie - Game Designer
